meanings.definition: A white crystalline compound used in the manufacture of dyes and perfumes.
meanings.sent1: The acetanilid sparkled in the sunlight, ready to be used in making colorful dyes.
meanings.sent2: Chemists often use acetanilid to create new perfumes with unique scents.
meanings.sent3: The acetanilid crystals decided to have a party and mix themselves into vibrant dyes.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like acetanilid, transforming ordinary scents into extraordinary perfumes.
meanings.sent5: The acetanilid shimmered like a diamond, promising to add beauty to the world of dyes.

meanings.sent1: After taking acetanilid, the pain in his head slowly faded away.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often prescribe acetanilid to help patients manage their discomfort.
meanings.sent3: The acetanilid tablets danced in the bottle, ready to relieve any ache or pain.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like acetanilid, soothing the emotional pain of those around her.
meanings.sent5: The acetanilid worked like magic, easing the pain as if it was never there.
